text.5_Chapter, 10_Verse, 2_Comment: Opposite Jerusalem – In the direction of the Holy Temple, and even though it was destroyed he did as Shlomo had said “…and pray to You toward their land…” (Kings I 8:48)
text.8_Chapter, 11_Verse, 0_Comment: as was done in Jerusalem – The sword, killing, burning the city, women violated and taken away in chains.
